content:
{"name": "Francis On The Hill", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- A bag of groceries is given.
- Numbers are given out at 1:30 pm so be sure to be there at or before that time.
- Meridian Hill Park is located in NW Washington between 16th and 15th Streets and Euclid St. on the north and W St. on the south. We distribute at the Chapin St. entrance which is halfway up the park on 15th St..
- They have 2 lines where one line is for the 260 premade bags they have on their truck and to get a ticket you have to arrive early while the second line is for anyone who didn't receive a ticket and got in line to get any extra food they may have", "email": "", "url": "https://www.followingfrancis.org/francisonthehill", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1498 Chapin Street Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Northwest Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20009", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9214632, "longitude": -77.0352114}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 680-0517", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Mobile pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
